transArray.content:
The hotel is on the Dashilan Pedestrian Street, and it is also the only hotel on this street that does not need to turn around.
You must live here if you have young children or those who are more noisy. The subway station is just outside the door. The food nearby is more expensive but they are all time-honored brands. It is enough to try something new when traveling.
Zhang Yiyuan's drink window and ice cream are especially recommended.
Quanjude in Qianmen is the first restaurant, and the taste of roast duck is completely different from other branches.
Hotel rooms are generally small and dense, but the breakfast is delayed until 12 o'clock, which is great.
